How do I launch a PBaaS-chain using Verus?

To launch a PBaaS-chain using Verus, you need to have a VerusID and 10,000 VRSC, which will be split between the Verus block producers and the block producers of the newly launched chain. No programming is required, and you can create your own token currency or full-fledged blockchain with DeFi capabilities.
